Company Overview.Name: Bajaj Finserv Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Bajaj Finserv Ltd. is the holding company for the various financial services businesses under the Bajaj group. It serves millions of customers by providing solutions for asset acquisition through financing, asset protection through general insurance, family and income protection in the form of life and health insurance, and retirement and savings solutions.
Company Overview.Market Position: Part of Nifty 500, Multicap 50:25:25, BSE 100, LargeCap TMC Index, Nifty100 ESG, Nifty 100 Low Volatility 30, BSE Diversified Financials Revenue Growth Index, Nifty LargeMidcap 250, Nifty 100, Nifty Services Sector, Nifty 200, Nifty Financial Services, Nifty 100 Equal Weight, BSE Allcap, BSE Sensex, Nifty 50, BSE LargeCap, BSE Low Volatility Index, BSE Financial Services, BSE 250 LargeMidCap Index, Nifty Financial Services 25/50, Nifty Total Market, BSE 500, BSE SENSEX 50, BSE 100 ESG Index (INR), BSE 100, BSE 200, BSE Dollex 200, Nifty 50 Equal Weight, Nifty 500
